description: Successive generations of the same family have run this pleasant restaurant just outside the city for over 70 years. Enjoy a selection of fish and seafood dishes (raw, grilled or fried with numerous condiments to accompany your starters) in a maritime themed dining room or on the light and airy veranda. There is a good selection of desserts to round off your meal.
